name: BONKY BALLS
description:
This is a small game I made in the past few weeks (and the first one that I ever finished).

The concept is very simple:

Defend yourself with bouncy balls against incoming foes.

The game controls entirely with your mouse:

  • Left: Shoot
  • Middle: Pause
  • Right: Move

Once you completed the regular game (yes, there is an ending) you unlock "endless mode" with increasingly difficult waves of enemies. I might add a combo-counter and highscore-system in the future to make it more fun.

Okay that's it, I'll let you figure out the rest :-) PEW BONK BONK BONK

Appreciate you so much for playing, hope you're having a little fun and feedback is very much welcome! <3<3<3
